body_html: Thanks for the feedback. @peterjc123, depending on how many cases we have of this, I would recommend exploring option 2 for a day or two and then fallback to option 1. @mingzhe09088 is also seeing challenges with enabling all of Caffe2 with shared DLL builds on Windows, so it's possible that we'll hit similar issues there. So maybe option 1 is going to be required regardless.
